title: description
Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' Strawberry Cre: A hot mix between the Strawberry Cream Cooler and the Sweet Dream(s) Cocktail. As white as Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' make.

title: notes
Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' Strawberry Cre: Gin, Lemon and a dash of jar.

title: pairing
Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' Strawberry Cre: Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars have it with a lil Demi-tasse and croissant.

title: serving_suggestion
Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars' Strawberry Cre: Several fresh strawberries muddled or frozen berries with juice. Drink to the fresh sounds of Uptown Funk.
